title: neTrik-kaNNai
sahitya:
neTrik-kaNNait-tirandEn aDaDA kAmA nIrupaTTuruvazhindAi


anupallavi

  saTrum bhayamillAmal tavat-taNalai shuDa saram toDuttAi nenjin uramennaDA ha hA


caraNam    viNNavar anuppiDa vEgamAi vandAi viLakkinai sADiya viTTal pOl vendAi
paNNiya tavattirkku bhangattai ninaitti pApa vinai sumandAi pO pO ananganE
